Header: Suspects of former minister Fernandopulle murder re-remanded
Content: The two suspects, former ASP for GampahaÂ Lakshman Cooray and Selvarajah Piribahakaran, arrested in connection to the murder of former minister Jeyaraj Fernandopulle were re-remanded till 22 nd this month. The case was taken up before Gampaha Magistrate today.
